activity.instructions: A friend has sent you an e-mail to invite you on a trip this weekend. Read the e-mail and write a reply with your answer.
activity.email: Hi Matt, #I hope things are good with you. I don't know what you're up to at the weekend. But Jamie and I and a few of the boys are going up to the mountains for a couple of days. The weather is supposed to be good, so we thought we could take the bikes, and stay in that youth hostel we stayed in last time. It would be great to see you and catch up on your news. Let us know if you can make it. Send my love to Madge. #Tim
